/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and distance. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand bare against the winter sky, their branches reaching out like skeletal fingers. The ground is covered in a blanket of fallen leaves, adding a touch of autumn to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The image is bathed in the soft light of early morning or late afternoon, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and leaves.
